name: Strike Suit Zero
blurb: Earth needs you! Help us raise enough to finish Strike Suit Zero, and bring the space combat genre back with a bang.

rewards.reward: /ENLISTED. Get your name added to the Roll of Honour in the credits for the game, with heart-felt thanks from everybody at Born Ready Games. We\u2019ll also furnish you with a trio of SSZ wallpapers, exclusive to our Kickstarter backers. Enlist today!
/CADET. 1000 early backers will get Strike Suit Zero, on the day of release, for just $15. Don't miss out!

/SQUADRON LEADER. Get your copy of Strike Suit Zero ready to download on the day of launch. In addition to this, you\u2019ll also receive three wallpapers \u2013 exclusive to this tier - for your desktop, iPhone and iPad TODAY.

/WING COMMANDER. The definitive Strike Suit Zero pack; not only will you get the bundle with the enhanced digital art-book and additional in game content, you\u2019ll also receive Paul Ruskay\u2019s original soundtrack - including the main theme by Kokia \u2013 AND the Kickstarter-exclusive Marauder Strike Suit -- unavailable anywhere else!\r\n\r\n  + FIRST 1000 BACKERS AT THIS TIER AND ABOVE GAIN EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO THE STRIKE SUIT ZERO BETA.

/ALPHA PILOT. As well as everything from the WING COMMANDER tier, you'll get a Logitech Extreme 3D Pro Joystick to pilot your Strike Suit with, courtesy of our friends at Logitech! IMPORTANT: This is just for US backers. Shipping costs included.
/STRIKE PILOT. As well as everything from the WING COMMANDER bundle above, you'll also get  the exclusive U.N.E t-shirt, designed in collaboration with our friends at Insert Coin Clothing.

/OMEGA PILOT. As well as everything from the WING COMMANDER tier, you'll get a Logitech Extreme 3D Pro Joystick to pilot your Strike Suit with, courtesy of our friends at Logitech! IMPORTANT: This is just for EU backers (Denmark, Belguim, Germany, Spain, France, Ireland, Italy, Hungary, The Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Switzerland, Finland, Sweden, UK, Austria.) Shipping costs included.
/ACE PILOT: Get a Logitech Extreme 3D Pro Joystick to pilot your Strike Suit with, courtesy of our friends at Logitech! You'll also get everything from the WING COMMANDER tier.
/CHIEF STRIKE PILOT. In addition to the tier above, we'll also send you a physical copy of the deluxe artbook; 40 pages of concept art and designs at the heart of the game - exclusive to Kickstarter.

/STRIKE COMMANDER. In addition to the t-shirt and deluxe artbook, you'll also become a life-time subscriber to the Strike Suit universe. You'll get all future content for the game - missions, weapons, new suits etc - on the day of release.

/SQUAD CAPTAIN: Space is cold. Get the Strike Suit Zero hoodie to keep that body temperature up. This one-off run of hoodies - designed alongside our friends at Insert Coin Clothing - can only be obtained through Kickstarter. Accept no substitutes \u2013 pledge today! [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]

/FLEET CONDUCTOR. One for the music lovers. At this level, you'll get an exclusive PHYSICAL copy of Paul Ruskay's soundtrack, with bonus tracks unavailable anywhere but Kickstarter. [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]

/PRO GAMER BUNDLE. A tier for the pro gamer! In addition to everything from the  WING COMMANDER tier, you'll get a Roccat headset (Kulo), mouse mat (Alumic), Mouse (Savu) and bag (Into). Please note: shipping is included in this tier.

/COMMODORE: Get an original, framed piece of artwork from the game. These stunning  paintings are printed at the highest possible grade, and framed ready for your wall of choice. [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]
/THE CAG. Get your very own Strike Suit; a 14cm figurine of Junji Okubo's design in mech mode, posed and ready for display. Only 90 in the world! [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]

/THE WARTHOG. In addition to everything from  the FLEET COMMANDER tier, you\u2019ll get a Thrustmaster HOTAS joystick \u2013 a must have for anybody that really takes their space combat seriously. Please note: shipping is include with this tier.
/HERO OF THE FLEET. Appear as a hero in a special mission in the game. Your likeness will be re-created in game, and the hero will share your name. [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]

/STRIKE SUIT HERO. The ultimate prize for any connoisseur of mechs and space ships: collaborate with Junji Okubo on bringing your own ideas for a mech (or space ship) to life. Based on your ideas, sketches and requests, Junji will design a mech specifically for you. Once you\u2019re happy with the design, it will then be sent for 3D printing. You will have a tangible figure of your very own mech; the only one on the face of the Earth. [+ STRIKE COMMANDER REWARDS]
